message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe I can't exceed $12,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me at this price?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is still a fair price considering the product's worth to you. Let's see if we can finalize this deal!
